summary: François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.
cast: Jean-Claude Drouot|Marie-France Boyer|Marcelle Faure-Bertin|Manon Lanclos|Sylvia Saurel|Marc Eyraud|Christian Riehl|Paul Vecchiali|Yvonne Dany|Claire Drouot|Olivier Drouot|Sandrine Drouot
title: La felicidad
